title: Storm Crow Alehouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pub and restaurant dedicated to all sorts of gaming and science fiction geekery with lots of memorabilia inside. Menu has vegan options which are reportedly cooked separately, including using a separate deep fryer. Uses  vegenaise and vegan gravy. At brunch a vegan burger and tofu scramble. At lunch and dinner chickpea fries, burgers, shepherd's pie, poutine, salad, and a vegan dessert. Everything is marked vegan.
